modName: WCICATI - Why Can I Carry All These Ingredients
summary: This mod adds a degree of realism by limiting the number ingredients the player can carry at one time. This limit is applied _per ingredient_ so that the player can carry a wide variety of ingredients but doesn't end up carrying an excessive amount of any particular ingredient. By crafting better alchemy satchels players can increase this limit
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b][/b][/size][/center][center][size=5][b]WCICATI - Why Can I Carry All These Ingredients?[/b][/size] [size=2]by FinalFrog[/size][/center]
[size=4]Version:[/size]
   [size=2]1.0 - Initial Release[/size]

[size=4]Requirements:[/size]
[list][*]SKSE v1.6.16 or newer (http://skse.silverlock.org/)[/*]
[*]SkyUI v4.1 or newer (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863)[/*]
[/list]
[size=4]Compatibility:[/size]
[list][*]This mod has no conflicts unless someone somewhere made a mod which requires the player to be carrying more than 250 of a single ingredient at one time.[/*]
[*]No compatibility patches needed to support mods which add new alchemy ingredients! =)[/*]
[/list]
[size=4]Summary:[/size]
   [size=2]This mod adds a degree of realism by limiting the number ingredients the player can carry at one time. This limit is applied _per ingredient_ so that the player can carry a wide variety of ingredients but doesn't end up carrying an excessive amount of any particular ingredient. By crafting better alchemy satchels players can increase this limit.[/size]
   
[size=4]Details:[/size]
   [size=2]Capacity Limits[/size]
[list][*]IInitially the player can carry up to 25 of each ingredient.[/*]
[*]Crafting the Basic Alchemy Satchel (1 Iron Ingot, 2 Leather, 2 Leather Strips) allows the player to carry up to 50 of each ingredient.[/*]
[*]Crafting the Advanced Alchemy Satchel (Basic Alchemy Satchel, 2 Linen Wraps, 1 Refined Moonstone) allows the player to carry up to 100 of each ingredient.[/*]
[*]All three of these settings are configurable in SkyUI's Mod Configuration Menu to any value from 0 to 250.[/*]
[/list]
   [size=2]Mechanics[/size]
[list][*]If the player tries to remove more ingredients from a container than they can carry they will only remove as many as they can carry and the rest will be left in the container.[/*]
[*]If the player tries to harvest more of an ingredient than they can carry the excess will be dropped onto the ground.[/*]
[*]If the player is given more of an ingredient than they can carry by npc/quest/script/console the excess will be dropped onto the ground.[/*]
[/list]
[size=4]Known Issues:[/size]
[list][*]The Satchels will hang in mid air if dropped, so I don't recommend doing this. If you accidentally do drop them you can pick them up without issue.[/*]
[*]I don't have a snappy picture to upload for the Featured/File header image. I have no artistic skills, so it can't be helped.[/*]
[/list]
[size=4]Recommended Mods:[/size]
[list][*]Harvest Overhaul (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16553)[/*]
[/list]
[size=4]Modders:[/size]
   [size=2]Source for the scripts is included. =)[/size]
   
[size=4]Credits:[/size]
[list][*]schlangster for the excellent SkyUI Mod Configuration Menu.[/*]
[*]Daimakaico for the MCM Designer utility (Didn't end up using it for the final product, but it was a nice stepping stone)[/*]
[/list]   
[size=4]Random Facts:[/size]
[list][*]Flying from London to New York by Concord, due to the time zones crossed, you can arrive 2 hours before you leave.[/*]
[*]It took Leo Tolstoy six years to write "War & Peace".[/*]
[*]Nobody knows who built the Taj Mahal. The names of the architects, masons, and designers that have come down to us have all proved to be latter-day inventions, and there is no evidence to indicate who the real creators were.[/*]
[*]A skunk's smell can be detected by a human a mile away.[/*]
[*]Liberace Museum in Las Vegas has a mirror-plated Rolls Royce; jewel-encrusted capes, and the largest rhinestone in the world, weighing 59 pounds and almost a foot in diameter.[/*]
[*]February is Black History Month.[/*]
[*]Rhode Island is the smallest state with the longest name. The official name, used on all state documents, is "Rhode Island and Providence Plantations."[/*]
[*]Odontophobia is the fear of teeth.[/*]
[*]"Goodbye" came from "God bye" which came from "God be with you."[/*]
[/list]
[size=4]Contact:[/size]
   Send any questions or inquiries by PM to FinalFrog on www.nexusmods.com

[size=4]Permissions:[/size]
   [size=2]Feel free to redistribute/modify/re-upload this mod whenever and wherever you like. I only ask two things:[/size]
[list=1][*]Please don't claim this mod as your own. That makes me sad. =([/*]
[*]Send me a PM when you redistribute/modify/re-upload my mod. It's not required and you don't need to wait for approval, it just makes me happy to know that people are enjoying my mod. =)[/*]
[/list]
author: FinalFrog
